posts.message:
For Front End Developers,

What are the best practices to test your code? Is it unit testing? end-to-end test or what? Is testing only applies to JavaScript code? Can you share your experiences with us?

{"id":"172338516139198_1331635240209514","from":{"name":"Yahya Elharony","id":"710364945810903"},"message":"مجرد سؤال مجننى :D
هو مواقع البنوك معندهمش ناس UI ؟ او حتى ناس Front-end بس بيعرفوا يعملوا UI كويس ؟
بلاش دى ,, مفيش تيم ليدر بيطرد الناس اللى بتطلع المنظر العار ده ؟ ولا التيم ليدر هناك بيكون عاجبه الشكل ده ؟
بلاش كل ده ,, العملاء مش بيبعتوا للبنك شكوى ان التصميم ده Unfriendly ومش عاجبهم ؟
الامثله كتيره اوى على البنوك دى ,, دول اللى فاكرهم :D :D
- QNB: http://www.qnbalahli.com/cs/Satellite/QNBEgypt/en_EG/enHome
- HSBC: https://www.hsbc.com.eg/1/2/eg/
- NBE البنك الاهلى : https://www.nbe.com.eg/
- BanqueMisr: http://www.banquemisr.com/ar
- HDB بنك التعمير والاسكان : http://www.hdb-egy.com/
- FaisalBank: http://www.faisalbank.com.eg/FIB/arabic/index.html

علشان محدش يقول ان الشكل ده طبيعى وعادى يعنى يكون ده UI موقع " بنك " ,, احب اقولكم ان فى بنوك فعلأ موقعهم نضيف من حيث ال UI و friendly جدأ زى :
- بنك المشرق ,, قمة الاحترام فى ال UX والموقع شكله يفتح النفس والله :D بصوا عليه كده : http://www.mashreqbank.com/egypt/ar/personal/personal
- البنك المركزى ( الموقع بتاعهم اتجدد من فتره قريبه اوى ,, كان زى اخواته اللى فوق واوحش كمان ) بس دلوقتى بأه نضيف : http://www.cbe.org.eg/ar/Pages/default.aspx","caption":null,"description":null,"created_time":"2016-12-19T21:31:55+11:00","total_likes":25,"total_comments":25}

{"id":"172338516139198_1333648613341510","from":{"name":"Mohamed Oun","id":"10210546759477547"},"message":"\"In a nutshell: they don’t\"","caption":"hub.zhovner.com","description":"In a nutshell — they don't. This is a story of ignorance, pain, and despair.","created_time":"2016-12-22T01:35:36+11:00","total_likes":1,"total_comments":0}

{"id":"172338516139198_1333739713332400","from":{"name":"Mohamed Alaa El Din","id":"1252478278163674"},"message":"httpbin(1): HTTP Request & Response Service","caption":"httpbin.org","description":"Testing an HTTP Library can become difficult sometimes. RequestBin is fantastic for testing POST requests, but doesn't let you control the response. This exists to cover all kinds of HTTP scenarios. Additional endpoints are being considered.","created_time":"2016-12-22T03:48:47+11:00","total_likes":1,"total_comments":0}

{"id":"172338516139198_1333582683348103","from":{"name":"Abdallah Hodieb","id":"10154911720956083"},"message":"I require help representing Prayer names (Asr, Magrib .. etc) in ipa or x-sampa phonetic alphabet. 

I'm working on a personal project, An Amazon Alexa skill to tell me the prayer times, and i only get data from the Local mosque for now. 

I have a problem with making Alexa pronounce the prayer names correctly. The only way to do it in a decent way is by using SSML (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Speech_Synthesis_Markup_Language), (https://developer.amazon.com/public/solutions/alexa/alexa-skills-kit/docs/speech-synthesis-markup-language-ssml-reference) using the ipa (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/International_Phonetic_Alphabet) or x-sampa (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/X-SAMPA) alphabet. 

My problems is that i have no idea how to pronounce the names correctly using any of those alphabets, and i haven't found any resource for that online. 

I'd appreciate any help, specially if any one has experience with phonetic alphabets.","caption":null,"description":null,"created_time":"2016-12-22T00:37:21+11:00","total_likes":1,"total_comments":1}
